attributes.action: Pay parents for teaching their children at home
attributes.background: As  parents we are working very hard now for children from cooking, upbringing to teaching. Govt should pay us something bcz we are teaching our children 5days with online studies. Because tutor stay in School during 6 hour studies and we stand with our children to help them on these hours.

rejection.details:
We understand you would like financial support for parents who are home-schooling their children due to the Covid-19 pandemic, however we're not sure if you want a salary or a one-off payment, nor how this would be calculated. 

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567637.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
